modules.name: Content Quality
modules.description: Evaluates depth, accuracy, and comprehensiveness of content
insights: Content is engaging but could be more comprehensive

recommendations.title: Enhance content depth
recommendations.description: Add more detailed information to 8 identified pages
actionItems: Expand content on 8 pages with more examples
Add case studies and practical applications
Include more detailed explanations
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 5-8 point increase in Content Quality score

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators
insights: Author bylines present on 70% of content

issues.message: 30% of content pages lack author attribution

recommendations.title: Add author bylines to remaining pages
recommendations.description: Complete author attribution across all content
actionItems: Add author bylines to 12 pages
Enhance author bio pages with more credentials
Include expertise areas and experience
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 6-10 point increase in E-E-A-T score

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Site structure, performance, and technical implementation
insights: Proper schema markup on most pages

issues.message: Some pages could benefit from additional schema

recommendations.title: Expand schema markup coverage
actionItems: Add appropriate schema to 6 identified pages
Review and optimize existing schema
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 3-5 point increase in Technical SEO score

modules.name: AI Readability
modules.description: How well content is structured for AI search engines
insights: Could benefit from more structured data

issues.message: Some headings could be more descriptive

recommendations.title: Improve heading descriptions
recommendations.description: Make headings more descriptive and informative
actionItems: Review and update headings on 10 pages
Ensure headings clearly describe content
Use more specific and descriptive language
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 4-6 point increase in AI Readability score

modules.name: Link Profile
modules.description: Quality and relevance of inbound and internal links

recommendations.title: Build high-authority backlinks
recommendations.description: Develop strategy for earning backlinks from authoritative domains
actionItems: Create linkable assets (guides, tools, research)
Develop outreach campaign
Build relationships with industry publications
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in Link Profile score over 3-6 months

modules.name: User Intent Alignment
modules.description: How well content matches search intent and user queries
insights: Most content aligns well with user intent
Some pages could better match search intent

issues.message: 5 pages have minor intent alignment issues

recommendations.title: Fine-tune intent alignment
recommendations.description: Improve intent alignment on 5 identified pages
actionItems: Review search intent for target keywords
Adjust content to better match intent
Update CTAs to align with intent
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 4-6 point increase in User Intent Alignment score

modules.name: Brand Signals
modules.description: Brand mentions, citations, and online presence
insights: Could benefit from more brand mentions

issues.message: Limited brand citations in industry directories

recommendations.title: Increase brand citations
recommendations.description: Build more brand citations and mentions
actionItems: Submit to relevant industry directories
Develop PR strategy for brand mentions
Build partnerships for co-marketing
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in Brand Signals score over 6 months
